descriptionlist.description: An elegant now playing overlay, that comes with you.
Aux was created to be clean and fit with stock iOS, and will be compatible with iOS 11 and up. But for now only iOS 13 and up is supported.
This is a beta release, as there is plenty to use now there will be many of updates very soon.
Aux has multiple styles, with more to come. Each style is designed to fit to your personal preference, or setup:
And more to come very soon!
You can move Aux to wherever you like it most, and customize the details and functionality.
And once again, there are LOTS of features coming in the official and future beta releases.
Feel free to contact me on Twitter (@Obumbravit), and request features or report bugs.
